name: The Chromatic Chasm
description:
Flash Warning - Background changes colors  quickly.

Created for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022 - my first solo jam!

Play through a series of 5 levels as a brave knight who has set out to cross the Chromatic Chasm. At the end of the chasm lies a boss who is set on ensuring you do not strike it's heart.

Use controllable platforms of various sizes and speeds to navigate around the onslaught of boss projectiles and obstacles.

Any and all feedback is appreciated, thanks for playing!

Mouse and Keyboard required. After playing the game use the browser back button to exit the "full screen" game page.

All assets created by me with the exception of:
- Platform thud sound effect (Mixkit)
- Boss laugh (Mixkit)
- Victory sound effect (Mixkit)
- Door sound effects (Mixkit)
- Music track 1 (Boomy AI)
- Music track 2 (Free-to-use sample)
